titleStmt.title: The application of certain histories concerning ambassadours and their functions, by Francis Thynn, Esquire. Taken out of Sir Robert Cottons library.
titleStmt.author: Thynne, Francis, 1545?-1608.
Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Crook, and J. Baker, and are to be sold at the sign of the Ship in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Histories concerning ambassadours.
A variant of the edition lacking J. Baker's name in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
